results.title: A randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled pilot study of simvastatin in aneurysmal subarachnoid hemorrhage.
results.text_hl: METHODS: Thirty-nine statin-naive @<m>DISEASE_Miller_Fisher_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019846 @@@Fisher grade 3@@@ @DISEASE_Subarachnoid_Hemorrhage @DISEASE_MESH:D013345 @@@SAH@@@ subjects were double-blind randomized to receive @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 80 mg/d (n=19) or placebo (n=20), stratified by Hunt and Hess grade.

citations.NLM: Chou SH, Smith EE, Badjatia N, Nogueira RG, Sims JR 2nd, Ogilvy CS, Rordorf GA, Ayata C. A randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled pilot study of simvastatin in aneurysmal subarachnoid hemorrhage. Stroke. 2008 Oct;39(10):2891-3. PMID: 18658043
citations.BibTeX: @article{18658043, title={A randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled pilot study of simvastatin in aneurysmal subarachnoid hemorrhage.}, author={Chou SH and Smith EE and Badjatia N and Nogueira RG and Sims JR 2nd and Ogilvy CS and Rordorf GA and Ayata C}, journal={Stroke}, volume={39}, number={10}, pages={2891-3}}
